name: AH Ventures
overview: AH Ventures is a venture capital arm of Adams, Harkness & Hill specializing in early to mid stage investments. It prefers to invest in software, technology manufacturing solutions, semiconductors, technology services, and resource optimization technologies. The firm also selectively pursues opportunities in communications equipment and infrastructure. Within software sector, it focuses on enterprise software (niche vertical applications and infrastructure), network infrastructure, digital media, and application tools. Within technology services, it focuses on companies providing outsourced services to corporations, governments, and consumers. The firm prefers to invest in North America but will consider investments internationally, in select cases. It seeks to invest in conjunction with other venture investors. AH Ventures is based in Boston, Massachusetts.
